<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82088</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4613</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">History of Books and Writing</string>
            <string language="es">Historia de los libros y la escritura</string>
            <string language="ga">Stair na Leabhar agus Scríbhneoireacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte der Bücher und des Schreibens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire des livres et de l'écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History dos livros e da escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia dei libri e della scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία των βιβλίων και του γραψίματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Printable worksheet with some challenging questions for pupils to complete in conjunction with the BBC's World Book Day website.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que se puede imprimir con algunas preguntas difíciles para que las respondan los alumnos utilizando la página web World Book Day de la BBC.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre inphriontáilte le roinnt ceisteanna dúshlánacha do dhaltaí le líonadh i gcomhair le láithreán gréasán World Book Day an BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT</string>
            <string language="es">ICT. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedruckbarer Bogen mit einigen schwierigen 
Fragen, damit Pupillen in Verbindung mit der buch-Tagesweb site des 
BBCs Weltdurchführen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau imprimable avec quelques questions 
provocantes pour que les pupilles terminent en même temps que le site
Web de jour de livre du monde de la BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha printable com algumas perguntas challenging
para que as pupilas terminem conjuntamente com o Web site do dia do 
livro do mundo do BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro stampabile con alcune domande 
challenging affinchè pupille completino insieme con il Web site di 
giorno del libro del mondo del BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτυπώσιμο φύλλο εργασίας με μερικές προκλητικές 
ερωτήσεις για τους μαθητές για να ολοκληρώσει από κοινού με τον 
ιστοχώρο ημέρας παγκόσμιων βιβλίων του BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
